bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Software Verification and Validation
Content Map to IEEE 12207.1
IEEE Standard for Software Verification and Validation - Content Map to IEEE 12207.1

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The relationship between the two sets of requirements on plans for verification and validation of software, found in IEEE Std 1012-1998 and IEEE/EIA 12207.1-1997, is explained so that users may produce documents that comply with both standards.

The relationship between the two sets of requirements on plans for verification and validation of software, found in IEEE Std 1012-1998 and IEEE/EIA 12207.1-1997, is explained so that users may produce documents that comply with both standards.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
